text:
Raskolnikov's Confusion

Raskolnikov looks disheveled, lost in thought.  
Dounia stares at him, puzzled.  
Raskolnikov: “Yes, yes... it’s very annoying...”  
Dounia: “What are you saying, Rodya?”  
Raskolnikov: “I wanted to come see you today...”  

---

Raskolnikov fidgets, avoiding eye contact.  
Pulcheria: “Is he answering us as a duty?”  
Dounia: “Is he asking forgiveness like a lesson?”  
Raskolnikov: “I was delayed... forgot to ask Nastasya...”  

---

Pulcheria looks alarmed, concerned.  
Pulcheria: “What blood?”  
Raskolnikov: “Oh, nothing... just a man I saw.”  
Razumihin: “But you remember everything!”  
Raskolnikov: “I can’t explain why I did that...”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Raskolnikov struggles to communicate with his family while grappling with his troubled state of mind and a recent traumatic experience.
